entry.title: [GRA6/8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 22, 2025, 21:00 UTC  -  Jan 23, 2025, 05:00 UTC

Dec 24, 10:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/01/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/01/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except during the rollback phase (scheduled between 01:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC), access to running Virtual Private Servers instances will not be possible during 1 to 5 mins.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)
We would like to inform you that during the second phase of our upcoming operation, scheduled for between 01:00 and 02:00 UTC, a rollback may be required. In this case, VPS instances will continue to run, but access will be temporarily impacted for a duration of less than 5 minutes.

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers ] - Racks R808L19 - R808L20

Root cause : The incident is caused by an issue with a cooling system module.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Start time : 27/12/2024 14:30 UTC

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Dec 27, 14:59 UTC

Here is detail for this incident :

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
